description.raw:
While working on [using ignition transport to delete/insert entities](#!/osrf/gazebo_design/src/insertion_deletion_flow/insertion_deletion_flow/insertion_deletion_flow.md?fileviewer=file-view-default), the transport node for `gui/*Maker` classes was not needed any more.

This pull request moves the node to the derived classes and removes `EntityMakerPrivate`, which is no longer needed. Future pull requests will completely remove gazebo transport from these classes.

In case you're curious about where this is going, take a look at branch [ignition_delete](#!/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/ignition_delete%0Ddefault#diff).


[coverage](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20coverage%20jobs/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/562/) :large_blue_circle:
